title: 10 משרות חמות בתחום התוכן, השיווק והמכירות
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות בתחום השיווק, מכירות והתוכן מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות בתחום השיווק, מכירות והתוכן מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
The position will include content writing, marketing writing, site analysis/auditing, editing, management of freelancers and overall working with our SEO teams to improve the quality of our sites. The candidate should have experience working on website copy.
Responsibilities:
Analyzing web copy and improving text
Delivering high-quality texts for our websites (including marketing and social)
Managing a team of freelancers and translators
Writing marketing content for newsletters, ads, etc.
Researching new trends in content
Requirements:
– Experience in marketing writing (required).
– Experience in site auditing.
– Experience in the online casino industry – a plus.
– Native English speaker.
Required attributes:
– Strong attention to detail, especially grammar rules and stylistics.
– Ability to write in many voices.
– Organized.
– Ability to multi-task.
– Proficiency with Word.
– Knowledge of WordPress, Content Management Systems a plus.
To send a CV for the position of Content Specialist – Webpals

We are looking for a passionate and competitive Outbound Sales Development Representative. The Sales Development Department is an extension of the Sales team, generating qualified sales opportunities through both inbound and outbound prospecting. The team’s role is to create new opportunities for the Account Executives to then cultivate through the sales cycle.
Responsibilities:
– Uncover and develop new opportunities from outbound activities.
– Build a strong pipeline of sales opportunities to deliver on sales targets.
– Meet or exceed monthly, quarterly and annual qualified sales opportunities targets.
– Conduct high level conversations with senior executives.
– Be fearless and relentless in creating new opportunities.
– Work US hours (EST) from Israel.
Requirements:
– BA/BS Degree or equivalent experience is required.
– Experience with high volume calling.
– Dynamic, high energy sales professional with 2-4 years proven track record—ideally in SaaS.
– Previous experience working in an outbound position.
– Experience with analyzing high volume calling processes.
– Exceptionally strong verbal and written communication skills.
– Professional business acumen, self-starter and results-driven personality.
– Excellent team management and prioritizing abilities.
– Proven track record achieving measurable sales goals in an automated sales environment where accurate entry and management of lead data in a CRM system is required. Experience with Salesforce.com is a plus.
– English – mother tongue.

The Online Media Manager position will work with the media sales community and clients to develop unique and strategically appropriate media approaches, including the exploration of venues. The Online Media Manager will manage and optimize all aspects of deals through established new networks, implement initiatives that enhance media productivity, create new growth opportunities and increase ROI. The Online Media Manager needs to create and maintain the constant communications with partners and motivate to provide maximum exposure and revenue.
Requirements:
– Fluent English – written and spoken – a must, Mother tongue – Significant advantage.
– Minimum of 1+ years as an Online Media Manager.
– Proven knowledge in RMX/Appnexus – an advantage.
– Proven knowledge in Double click Ad serving platform – an advantage.
– Proven, measurable results in developing and growing an internal affiliate channel/program.

– Knowledge and understanding of affiliate tracking methods, tagging and sale attribution.

The Business Development Manager will focus mainly on the POS provider and POS reseller markets; promoting the Como platform as the leading mobile loyalty and engagement solution for businesses and the customers.  The ideal candidate will have a rich experience in the point of sale market and/ or with companies selling products that integrate with POS companies.
The individual will work mainly on developing partnerships and new distribution channels for Como.  The Business Development Manager will get full product training and be equipped with Como’s top sales and marketing tools. This position will report into Como’s UK Managing Director, based in London.
Core Responsibilities:
– Source and close integration and partnership deals with small and mid-size POS companies.
– Develop new business opportunities through established networks, relationships, independent research, and online sales strategies.
– Proactively execute business-to-business outreach to target high value accounts.
Requirements:
– At least 5 years of Business development experience, including face-to-face meetings with all decision making levels, outbound calls, and/or online sales. Experience selling digital platforms, such as mobile apps, online ads, CRM systems, POS solutions, websites, etc.
– A knowledge of the optimal businesses in the UK territory for the solution.
– Strong negotiation skills.
– Self-motivated with an excellent work ethic.
– First-rate communication and presentation skills.
